prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that resembles an armored dinosaur with a strong build.
Imagine a steel-type creature with a metallic body and powerful limbs, ready for battle.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a giant armored beast, perfect for a rocky terrain.
Show me a fierce-looking Pokemon that can withstand any physical attack with its tough armor.
Design a Pokemon with a massive body and sharp claws, ideal for a mountainous habitat.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that combines strength and defense, featuring a gray color palette.
Make a Pokemon that has a fearsome appearance, with multiple spikes and a solid stance.
